text: We have no other choice but to accept.
Our coffers are bare so we must accept.
Alas, we all have a price.
Pay us gold or come to regret it.
The very thought of dealing with you twists my soul like a corkscrew.
Careful now, I can cut your head off and have it back in my scabbard in a single second.
This is the dark path gold leads us.
I don't have your advantage, I can't fly here on my own hot air.
I’d sooner kill you for pleasure, then work for you for gold.
No amount of gold, would see my men work for the likes of you.
Call me Commander!
Have you taking time off from burning innocent women?
You smell of death, more than usual that is.
We gladly accept.
Of course old friend.
We need coin to secure the borderlands.
Are the terms agreeable?
For other’s we’d charge more.
So friend, what say you.
We regrettably cannot help this time.
We are under contract with another lord but let’s discuss this next Festag.
These terms are regrettably not acceptable, maybe a little more gold.
Welcome old friend.
The Grudgebringers are at your service.
Are you in need of our help?
We accept, though a little more gold wouldn’t have gone amiss.
These terms are agreeable, Paymaster Dietrich will write up the contracts.
Thank you for the payment.
The Grudgebringers are in your debt.
Paymaster Dietrich will be pleased.
Paymaster Dietrich will run through the contracts.
Is there anything we can do for you, possibly resulting in the payment of gold for us.
We hope we can return the favour for a small fee of course.
Was the price too high?
We’ll remember this next time you call for our aid.
Hopefully we can work together in the future, but our costs might not be so favourable next time.
We thought the terms we’re agreeable.
We’re open to counter-offers, though we expect some gold for our trouble.
Our price just increased.
Hold the high ground men. Purge the evil with steel, arrows and fire!
Win or lose, the ravens always dine well.
We'll part flesh with cold steel.
No gold, no treaty.
No payment has voided our obligation.
We regrettably can not continue with this.
Spit out the fear, drive out the dread with bloodlust.
Help us! They’re slaughtering us!
We have helped you many times, will you help us now?
How can you repay us? I’ll give you a clue, they're round, they glitter and they fill purses.
Not too costly I hope.
Mercenaries are always better friends than foes.
Do you agree to our terms?
A few more purses of gold should settle it.
We require more gold for such a proposal.
The Grudgebringers do not come so cheaply.
Let us fight together, for glory and gold.
Can the Grudgebringers be of service to you.
The Grudgebringers reputation speaks for itself.
This war has dragged on long enough.
This war is no longer profitable for either of us, lets call a truce.
There’s no glory or gold to be had in this war.
Ogres make good fighters. We’ll make sure they don't drink too much blood during battles.
How can you repay us? I’ll give you a clue, they're round, they glitter and they fill purses.
Can the Grudgebringers be of service to you?
Sometimes glory is more important than gold.
If you need any mercenaries, bear us in mind.
We’re sure you’ll repay it more than double in future work for us.
Welcome, I am Commander Bernhardt, how can I be of service?
Are you in need of mercenaries?
What can the Grudgebringers do for you?
I live to cheat death.
There is more coin and glory to be found in this war.
We are being paid to see your head on a stake and we will see it done.
We are under contract with another lord.
We are under another mercenary contract.
A chestful of gold might change our minds.
Death to the enemy!
Will will give no quarter, no pity, no mercy. We will slay and slay again so we might live.
You’re plagued by a pestilence that I'm here to cure - With steel and fire!
